00010 #ifndef BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_REF_STATIC_ARRAY_ALLOC_LAZY_ALLOC_ER_2010_HPP
00011 #define BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_REF_STATIC_ARRAY_ALLOC_LAZY_ALLOC_ER_2010_HPP
00012 #include <boost/shared_ptr.hpp>
00013 #include <boost/assign/v2/ref/wrapper/wrapper.hpp>
00014 #include <boost/assign/v2/ref/fusion/assign_array.hpp>
00015 #include <boost/assign/v2/ref/static_array/alloc/lazy_alloc_fwd.hpp>
00016 #include <boost/assign/v2/ref/static_array/interface.hpp>
00017  
00018 namespace boost{
00019 namespace assign{
00020 namespace v2{
00021 namespace ref{
00022 namespace alloc_tag{
00023         struct lazy_alloc;
00024 }// alloc_tag
00025 namespace static_array_aux{ 
00026                   
00027         template<std::size_t N,typename Tag, typename T, typename D>
00028         class lazy_alloc : public static_array_aux::interface<
00029                 N, Tag, T, lazy_alloc<N,Tag,T,D> 
00030         >
00031     {
00032         typedef Tag assign_tag_;
00033         typedef typename ref::wrapper<assign_tag_,T> wrapper_;
00034         typedef boost::array<wrapper_,N> array_;
00035 
00036                 typedef boost::mpl::int_<N> size_;
00037                 
00038         void alloc_if()const{
00039             if(!this->ptr){
00040                return this->alloc();
00041             }
00042         }
00043 
00044         void alloc()const{ 
00045             this->ptr = smart_ptr_(new array_);
00046             assign_array(
00047                 *this->ptr,
00048                 static_cast<const D&>(*this)
00049             );  
00050         }
00051 
00052                 typedef static_array_aux::interface<
00053                         N, Tag, T, lazy_alloc 
00054                 > super_t;
00055                 
00056         public:
00057 
00058         array_& impl(){ 
00059             this->alloc_if();
00060             return (*this->ptr);
00061         }
00062 
00063         array_ const & impl()const{ 
00064             this->alloc_if();
00065             return (*this->ptr);
00066         }
00067         
00068         using super_t::operator[];
00069         
00070         private:
00071         
00072         typedef boost::shared_ptr<array_> smart_ptr_;
00073         mutable smart_ptr_ ptr;
00074 
00075     };
00076 
00077 }// static_array_aux
00078 }// ref 
00079 }// v2    
00080 }// assign
00081 }// boost
00082 
00083 #endif
